title: (x) "Jennifer+Kevin McCoy" logo square sans - Beta Sans {Chris K}
author: kwebb

comments.content:
The 'S' looks odd, and out of place, so I guess that character may be from a completely different typeface, or customized.

' [Dev _( Gothic )_](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103164126/http:/www.dafont.com/dev-gothic.font)' may be an alternate for the rest, except for the 'I' and 'S'.

Dav
You're right about that 'S'. Dev is real close. I'm still looking because I like the soft edges, but this could also be the printing or custom work.

It's Beta Sans Bold from Shift Type but their site is down right now. I don't know if it's available anywhere else. I recreated a sample.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103164126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/betasans.jpg)

Nicely ID'ed, Chris, I totally missed out on 'Beta'.  
_( But, The 'S' still seems strange; Or is it just me? :)_
Hmmm, that's odd. I ususally have no trouble at all recognising Beta Sans, but the all caps setting seems to have thrown me off. Very nice, Chris, good one. :^)
